message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product. I am willing to pay $11,000 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I see the value you place on it, I can't go as low as $11,000. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $11,100 for the product.
